turkish_example_sentence: Sen o tatlı romantik aşk hissini kalbinde hissetmemiş olsaydın mektubu yazmazdın
english_example_sentence: If you hadn't felt that sweet romantic love feeling in your heart, you wouldn't have written the letter
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты не почувствовал то сладкое романтическое чувство любви в своем сердце, ты бы не написал письмо
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen o tatlı romantik aşk hissini kalbinde ______ mektubu yazmazdın
